function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential barriers to wearables' usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","Impact":"Limitation of the usability and functions of wearables for practical use in healthcare.","Mitigation":"Addressing user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns through research and development.","Technologies":"IoT and wearable technology advancements to address security and big data concerns.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and developers of wearable technology.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and technology developers."}]}
